long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dumbload is your go-to tool for effortlessly downloading videos and music from virtually any website. With just a click, you can save your favorite content directly to your device, whether it's a video from social media, a music track from an online streaming service, or any other multimedia content you find online.

Here's some key features:
✔️ User Script Integration: Boost your experience by adding custom user scripts for enhanced functionality and control.
✔️ File Size Preview: See the file size before downloading, so you know exactly what you're getting.
✔️ Quick Copy & Download Links: Easily copy or download direct links with dedicated buttons for fast access.
✔️ Popup Video Viewing: Watch videos in a separate popup window while you continue browsing.

Simple, fast, and reliable—Dumbload makes it easier than ever to enjoy your favorite media offline. No complicated settings, no limits—just pure downloading power at your fingertips.

Get Dumbload today and take control of your online media experience!
